item.title: Brandy Alexander
item.description: 2 oz Cognac or other brandy1 oz heavy creamÂ½ oz demerara syrupfresh grated nutmeg Add brandy, cream, and demerara syrup to a cocktail shaker. Shake. Strain into coupe glass. Top with grated nutmeg.
